title: Oven-Baked Omelette
ingredients: ['10 eggs', '5 tablespoons semi skimmed milk', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '4 dashes Tabasco Sauce, or to taste', '225g (8 oz) bacon, cooked and diced', '100g (4 oz) black olives, pitted and chopped', '2 plum tomatoes, chopped', '4 spring onions, chopped', '50g (2 oz) mushrooms, sliced', '100g (4 oz) mild Cheddar cheese, grated']
